column6: Cozy Victorian in the heart of Chappell Hill, walk to Main Street, visit the wineries, or just enjoy our porches! Your private suite is our remodeled Attic, with a queen size bed and a double bed so friends and family can share- An en-suite bathroom and sitting area complete your retreat.\nYou have the full use of our kitchen for cooking,dining room for seating and lounge for gathering, and of course our porches for \
